Reviews.Title: Blackberry Torch 9810 4G - GREAT PRODUCT!
Reviews.Author: Jorge Duarte
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. I was worried cause the picture provided by the seller doesn't match the actual product. But I took the chance and it was the real thing, just like the pictures provided by other customers. The product works perfectly with CLARO in Guatemala. It can use 4G (HSPA+), 3G (UMT5850, 1900, 2100) or 2G(Edge, GPRS, GSM, 850, 900, 1800, 1900). The language con easily be changed to Spanish. The only disadvantage is that it doesn't come with a MicroSD as an extra memory, although it already has 8GB of internal memory.

Reviews.Title: MUST READ
Reviews.Author: Linda K.
Reviews.Content: Everyone, before you buy this please note that this is a Brushed Aluminum Case in BLACK. I don't know why it says "White" in the product description (or any of the other stuff). If that's what you're looking for (and its a good case) then buy it but don't get confused by all the gibberish in the title.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Sebastian
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, very good seller, my order arrived within the stipulated time, recommend to all, five stars seller, I am satisfied with my purchase since buying amazon has always been a pleasant experience. Once you have the product in your hands you can not think of anything else other than you made an excellent choice to disburse money to acquire it. The seller will behave responsibly and comply with the details and shipping details. All Perfect, All good, all amazing.Excelente producto, muy buen vendedor, mi pedido llegó en el tiempo estipulado, lo recomiendo a todos, cinco estrellas al vendedor, estoy satisfecho con mi compra ya que comprar en amazon siempre ha sido una experiencia agradable. Una vez tienes el producto en tus manos no puedes pensar en otra cosa que no sea que hiciste una excelente elección al desembolsar dinero por adquirirlo. El vendedor se comporto responsable y cumplió con los detalles del producto y los detalles del envío. All Perfect, All good, all amazing.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos
Reviews.Content: llego en perfectas condiciones completamente nuevo con todos sus accesorios, recomendado lo despacharon al dia siguiente de la compra, todo perfecto.

Reviews.Title: VERY BAD ORGANIZATION
Reviews.Author: CINDY DE LA ROSA
Reviews.Content: I REMIND THE DESCRIPTION OF THE PHONE, Blackberry 9810 Torch 2 4G Unlocked Phone with 1.2GHz Processor, GPS, 8GB. OS 7, WiFi, 5 MP Camera and HD Video - Unlocked World Phone - No Warranty - White. WHICH IS SENT ME IS SILVER COLOR, VERY BAD ORGANIZATION, NOT BUY MORE TO THIS PROVIDER.

Reviews.Title: Question
Reviews.Author: vane
Reviews.Content: Hi! I have a question,  I would like to know if this celular technology is GSM or CDMA ? please let me know!! Thank you!!

Reviews.Title: Just good
Reviews.Author: Sol
Reviews.Content: The item arrived on time, what the color was not WHITE as he said in the annoucement.Everythimg else was good.I was a little bit dissapointed !!

Reviews.Title: consulta
Reviews.Author: mariana gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Hello I am interested in buying the item but I know that band works because my company is movistar Venezuela and works with 1900 .... I await your prompt response to make the purchase
